allow: Bash(bash -c "source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 20.19.6 && npm install vite@latest @vitejs/plugin-react@latest --save-dev --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com")
Bash(bash -c "source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 20.19.6 && npm run dev")

Bash(bash -c "source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use 20.19.6 && npm install react-markdown remark-gfm rehype-highlight rehype-raw @google/generative-ai openai @anthropic-ai/sdk zustand react-dropzone --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com")
